summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Valentine Card creation app. Backend APIs fully functional with AI-powered content generation. Frontend navigation and interactive features working correctly with minor clipboard permission issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Clipboard write permission denied when sharing card links
ui_bugs.details: Browser security restriction prevents clipboard access in certain contexts. Functionality works but shows error overlay.

passed_tests: POST /api/cards - Card creation with AI content generation
Landing page load with floating hearts animation
Interactive card experience (poem, photos, love notes, scratch card)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix clipboard permission error in share functionality by adding proper error handling or using alternative sharing methods (e.g., show shareable link in modal instead of auto-copying)
